greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients in an asymptotic expansion of sequence A003319.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..420
formula: For n>0, Sum_{k=1..n} a(k) * Stirling1(n-1, k-1) = A259472(n). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 03 2015
For n>0, a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} A259472(k) * Stirling2(n-1, k-1). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 03 2015
mathematica: Flatten[{1, Table[Sum[Assuming[Element[x,Reals], SeriesCoefficient[E^(2/x)*x^2 / ExpIntegralEi[1/x]^2,{x,0,k}]] * StirlingS2[n-1,k-1], {k,1,n}], {n,1,20}]}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 03 2015 *)
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 27 2015
